channel.title: Emergent Communication on Michael Noukhovitch
channel.description: Recent content in Emergent Communication on Michael Noukhovitch

item.title: Emergent Communication: An Introduction
item.description: For the past two years, I have been fascinated by the field of emergent communication; I even made it the topic of my master’s thesis. This year, I am co-organizing the event that sparked my interest: The Workshop on Emergent Communication at NeurIPS 2019. To give others a look into the field (and also to make my thesis writing more fun), I will be writing a series of blog posts on emergent communication that are meant to be accessible and interesting. I’m hoping to communicate some of the magic that has captivated me.
